by-types.jcr:title: search resources by types
by-types.jcr:description:
is searching all nodes with matching resource type ('like' rule) of the given primary type which are descendants of the specified root node

the 'root path', the 'resource type' pattern and the 'primary type' value are placeholders mapped to query parameter values; a placeholder can have a 'type' (currently 'path ' only) and 'grow' sizing hint (e.g. 'root_path.path.2'); up to four placeholders patterns are scanned
by-types.sql2: select n.* from [${primary_type}] as n where n.[sling:resourceType] like '${resource_type.4}' and isdescendantnode(n,[${root_path.path.2}])

by-resource-type.jcr:title: search by resource types
by-resource-type.jcr:description: is searching all nodes with matching resource type ('like' rule)
by-resource-type.sql2: select n.* from [nt:base] as n where n.[sling:resourceType] like '${resource_type.3}' and isdescendantnode(n,[${root_path.path}])
